summary: A young couple gets more than they bargained for when they buy an historic bed and breakfast in New England only to discover that the old house is hiding a dark secret within its walls.
cast: Elise Couture|Michael Reed|Judith Chaffee|Rebecca Whitehurst|India Pearl|Vasilios Asimakos|Edmund Donovan|Erica Derrickson|Danny Bryck|Victoria Nugent
title: The Inhabitants
